title: LA-24-07: Understanding the Recusal Obligations of Employees Affiliated with State and Local Government Entities
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/63CD1B1A3F4A56E785258B38004A7D7D/$FILE/LA-24-07 - Understanding the Recusal Obligations of Employees Affiliated with State and Local Government Entities.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory discusses the application of the terms “organization” under 18 U.S.C. § 208 and “person” under 5 C.F.R. § 2635.502 for employees with outside employment interests with state and local government entities.
